name: GetItSMS WhatsApp APIs
description:
Send And Receive WhatsApp Bulk Messages(WhatsApp Marketing Messages) Through Whatsapp Business API Gateway(WhatsApp Green Tick Verification). For the Purpose Of Sending Notifications, OTPs, Or Anything Else Using Our WhatsApp Business API (WhatsApp Official API) Or WhatsApp OTP API and WhatsApp Chatbot. For Demo Contact Us(+91-7976724242) Or Register Here - http://sms.getitsms.com/signup 

Shopify Integration - https://apps.shopify.com/wpplugins

api_methods.name: GetIT SMS WHATSAPP API
api_methods.description: We are providing bulk whatsapp sms services.To use our whatsapp bulk sms  service you need api key.Go through our application and get our service.

utterances.utterance: Can you send a WhatsApp message to 919812345678 saying 'Your order #12345 has been shipped and will arrive tomorrow'?

parameters.your_message: Your order #12345 has been shipped and will arrive tomorrow

utterances.utterance: Let my friend Priya know on WhatsApp at 919876543210 that the movie night is postponed to Saturday.

parameters.your_message: The movie night is postponed to Saturday

utterances.utterance: Remind my client at 919834567890 via WhatsApp: 'Your appointment with Dr. Mehra is scheduled for 4 PM today.'

parameters.your_message: Your appointment with Dr. Mehra is scheduled for 4 PM today.

utterances.utterance: Please notify 919845612378 on WhatsApp with the message: 'Congratulations! You have won the lucky draw for June.'

parameters.your_message: Congratulations! You have won the lucky draw for June.

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp alert to 919812398765: 'Your electricity bill for May is due on the 10th.'

parameters.your_message: Your electricity bill for May is due on the 10th.

utterances.utterance: Could you inform 919823456789 on WhatsApp that the team meeting will start at 11 AM instead of 10 AM?

parameters.your_message: The team meeting will start at 11 AM instead of 10 AM.

utterances.utterance: Let 919876512340 know through WhatsApp: 'Happy Birthday, Rohan! Wishing you a fantastic year ahead.'

parameters.your_message: Happy Birthday, Rohan! Wishing you a fantastic year ahead.

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp message to 919800123456: 'Your cab has arrived and is waiting at the main gate.'

parameters.your_message: Your cab has arrived and is waiting at the main gate.

utterances.utterance: Can you notify 919812300987 on WhatsApp: 'Your package from Amazon will be delivered today between 2-5 PM.'?

parameters.your_message: Your package from Amazon will be delivered today between 2-5 PM.

utterances.utterance: Please send a WhatsApp message to 919876543219: 'Your OTP for login is 482913. Do not share it with anyone.'

parameters.your_message: Your OTP for login is 482913. Do not share it with anyone.
